alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 2:38AM PST until February 15 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. The strong winds will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow where new snow has fallen. * WHERE...White Pine County, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Blowing and drifting snow will cause reductions to visibility to one mile or less as well as slick and hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; White Pine County
